communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Oregon Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

This request relates to a stop, detention, and/or arrest on or about August 12, 2025. Portions of that incident are depicted here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B95YrAey3EM. Two of the officers involved are Colin Woolston and Jason Stramler. A third officer or employee, Michael Rea, appears to be present.

I request:

1. Any incident report, arrest report, or other narrative stemming from the stop or the officers' interactions with person(s) filming the stop or arrest.

2. Any video or audio recording made by body camera or vehicular-mounted camera during the stop, detention, or arrest.

3. Any video or audio recording made using the camera system operated by Michael during the stop, detention, or arrest.

4. Any policies concerning whether or when officers or employees of the Eugene Police Department may self-identify as "press."

5. Any policies concerning Eugene police officers' interactions with (a) members of the media or with (b) other members of the public filming.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh

title: Request for Inmate Harley Rawson’s Non-Privileged Phone Recordings (Jan–Mar 2025)

communications.subject: Ohio Open Records Law Request: Request for Inmate Harley Rawson’s Non-Privileged Phone Recordings (Jan–Mar 2025)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Ohio Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

All outgoing, non-privileged recorded phone calls made by inmate Harley Rawson (Inmate ID A702673) between January 1, 2025, and March 1, 2025.

This request expressly excludes any calls protected by attorney-client privilege, medical confidentiality, clergy communication, or other categories deemed exempt under Ohio law.

I am an independent filmmaker working on a documentary project exploring inmate communication and transparency within the Ohio correctional system. This request is made in the public interest and intended for journalistic and educational purposes.

If portions of this request are exempt from disclosure, please provide the non-exempt portions and cite the specific legal exemption for any withheld or redacted content.

I am willing to pay reasonable costs associated with the processing, duplication, or redaction of these records.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Chadd Moser
